TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IValueConverter

summary.span: 提供方法，將自訂邏輯套用至繫結。

span.span: Provides a way to apply custom logic to a binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要繫結相關聯的值轉換器，建立類別可實作介面，然後再實作和方法。If you want to associate a value converter with a binding, create a class that implements the interface and then implement the and methods. 轉換器可以將資料從一種類型變更為另一個、 轉譯資料是根據文化特性資訊，或修改展示檔的其他層面。Converters can change data from one type to another, translate data based on cultural information, or modify other aspects of the presentation. 例如一些典型的轉換子案例的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 資料轉換 」 中[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For examples of some typical converter scenarios, see "Data Conversion" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 值轉換器會區分文化特性。Value converters are culture-aware. 同時並方法有`culture`參數，表示文化特性資訊。Both the and methods have a `culture` parameter that indicates the cultural information. 如果不會影響轉換的文化特性資訊，然後您就可以忽略該參數在您的自訂轉換子。If cultural information is irrelevant to the conversion, then you can ignore that parameter in your custom converter. 並方法也有參數，稱為`parameter`，讓您可以使用這個轉換子的相同執行個體使用不同的參數。The and methods also have a parameter called `parameter` so that you can use the same instance of the converter with different parameters. 比方說，您可以撰寫格式化的轉換子，會產生不同格式的資料是根據您所使用的輸入參數。For example, you can write a formatting converter that produces different formats of data based on the input parameter that you use. 您可以使用的類別，以做為引數方式傳遞參數和方法。You can use the of the class to pass a parameter as an argument into the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Convert (object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Convert(object value, class System.Type targetType, object parameter, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function Convert (value As Object, targetType As Type, parameter As Object, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Convert(System::Object ^ value, Type ^ targetType, System::Object ^ parameter, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member Convert : obj * Type * obj * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

param.name: value
param.span: 由繫結來源所產生的值。

span.span: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.

param.name: culture
param.span: 要在轉換子中使用的文化特性。

span.span: The culture to use in the converter.

returns.span: 如果方法傳回 ，就會使用有效的 null 值。

span.span: If the method returns , the valid null value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它會傳播到繫結目標繫結來源的值時，資料繫結引擎會呼叫這個方法。The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates a value from the binding source to the binding target. 資料繫結引擎不會攔截由使用者提供的轉換器會擲回的例外狀況。The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter. 所擲回任何例外狀況方法所擲回任何未攔截到例外狀況，方法呼叫會被視為執行階段錯誤。Any exception that is thrown by the method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the method calls, are treated as run-time errors. 處理預期的問題，藉由傳回。Handle anticipated problems by returning . 傳回值表示轉換子產生任何值，而且繫結使用若有的話的預設值改為或。A return value of indicates that the converter produced no value and that the binding uses the , if available, or the default value instead. 傳回值指出，繫結不會傳送值或使用或預設值。A return value of indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or default value.

MemberSignature.Value: public object ConvertBack (object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ConvertBack(object value, class System.Type targetType, object parameter, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function ConvertBack (value As Object, targetType As Type, parameter As Object, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: System::Object ^ ConvertBack(System::Object ^ value, Type ^ targetType, System::Object ^ parameter, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member ConvertBack : obj * Type * obj * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

param.name: value
param.span: 由繫結目標所產生的值。

span.span: The value that is produced by the binding target.

param.name: culture
param.span: 要在轉換子中使用的文化特性。

span.span: The culture to use in the converter.

returns.span: 如果方法傳回 ，就會使用有效的 null 值。

span.span: If the method returns , the valid null value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它會傳播到繫結來源繫結目標的值時，資料繫結引擎會呼叫這個方法。The data binding engine calls this method when it propagates a value from the binding target to the binding source. 此方法的實作必須是反向方法。The implementation of this method must be the inverse of the method. 資料繫結引擎不會攔截由使用者提供的轉換器會擲回的例外狀況。The data binding engine does not catch exceptions that are thrown by a user-supplied converter. 所擲回任何例外狀況方法所擲回任何未攔截到例外狀況，方法呼叫會被視為執行階段錯誤。Any exception that is thrown by the method, or any uncaught exceptions that are thrown by methods that the method calls, are treated as run-time errors. 藉由傳回處理預期的問題。。Handle anticipated problems by returning .. 傳回值表示轉換子產生任何值，而且繫結使用若有的話的預設值改為或。A return value of indicates that the converter produced no value and that the binding uses the , if available, or the default value instead. 傳回值指出，繫結不會傳送值或使用或預設值。A return value of indicates that the binding does not transfer the value or use the or default value.
